title: Dynamic Installer
author: BlassGO
description: Automates installations for Recovery, Magisk, KSU, and more. It supports multi-architecture and provides extensive modding tools for seamless project management and large-scale modding on Android devices.

title: App Manager
author: BlassGO
description: A lightweight Android tool to retrieve detailed info on system and user apps, including status, ID, path, and extract app icons via ADB, without the need for additional installations.
